content:
/>
VIII.ii.1.D.1.b
.
Presumptive SC for Infectious Diseases Under 38 CFR 3.317(c)
Effective September 29, 2010, presumptive SC is established under
38 CFR 3.317(c)
for the specified infectious diseases if
the Veteran had qualifying service as detailed in
M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart ii, 1.D.1.a
, and
the disease becomes manifest to a compensable degree within the time limit specified in
38 CFR 3.317(c)(3)(i)
and
M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart ii, 1.A.2.c
.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart ii, Chapter 1, Section D - Presumptive Service Connection (SC) for Infectious Disease Under 38 CFR 3.317
citation: Part VIII, Subpart ii, Chapter 1, Section D
